;----------------------------
; Start of Draggable Switches Support Section
; Added by Swordmaster on 16 Jun 2013
;----------------------------
; orthogonal DTR A1 switches
0x53940400,3,0,0x03031500,1,0=0x53940400,3,0,0x53940500,3,0
0x53940400,3,0,0x03031500,3,0=0x53940400,3,0,0x53940500,3,0
0x53940400,1,1,0x03031500,1,0=0x53940400,1,1,0x53940500,1,1
0x53940400,1,1,0x03031500,3,0=0x53940400,1,1,0x53940500,1,1
0x53940200,3,0,0x53940100,1,1=0x53940c00,3,0,0x53940100,1,1
0x53940200,1,1,0x53940100,3,0=0x53940c00,1,1,0x53940100,3,0
0x53940100,3,0,0x53940000,1,1=0x53940100,3,0,0x53940c00,3,0
0x53940100,1,1,0x53940000,3,0=0x53940100,1,1,0x53940c00,1,1
; orthogonal DTR A2 switch main
0x53948100,1,0,0x03031500,1,0=0x53948100,1,0,0x53948000,1,0
0x53948100,1,0,0x03031500,3,0=0x53948100,1,0,0x53948000,1,0
0x53948100,3,1,0x03031500,1,0=0x53948100,3,1,0x53948000,3,1
0x53948100,3,1,0x03031500,3,0=0x53948100,3,1,0x53948000,3,1

0x53948200,3,1,0x03031500,1,0=0x53948200,3,1,0x53948100,3,1
0x53948200,3,1,0x03031500,3,0=0x53948200,3,1,0x53948100,3,1
; orthogonal DTR A2 switch variations
0x53948000,1,0,0x53948100,1,1=0x53948800,1,0,0x53948100,1,1
0x53948000,3,1,0x53948100,3,0=0x53948800,3,1,0x53948100,3,0

; orthogonal DTR B2 switch

0x53949700,1,1,0x03001a00,1,0=0x53949700,1,1,0x53949800,1,1
; orthogonal DTR B2 switch variations
0x53949000,2,0,0x53940300,2,1=0x53949400,2,1,0x53940300,2,1
0x53949000,0,1,0x53940300,0,0=0x53949400,0,0,0x53940300,0,0

; STR continuation from X1 switches
